text: The 1963 Oregon State Beavers football team represented Oregon State University as an independent during the 1963 NCAA University Division football season. In their ninth season under head coach Tommy Prothro, the Beavers compiled a 5–5 record and were outscored by their opponents, 198 to 192. The team played its home games at Parker Stadium in Corvallis, Oregon. ==Schedule== ==Roster== *E Vern Burke, Sr. *OL Rich Koeper, Jr. *QB Gordon Queen ==References== Category:Oregon State Beavers football seasons Oregon State Category:1963 in sports in Oregon
title: 1963 Oregon State Beavers football team
